--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Who controls Astral and Co.? They have fire heading there 
> way.
> 
> ::Rampage::
> Rampage tries to dodge the machine gun fire from Epyon, but 
> bullet holes appear in the side of his armour. Mechafluid begins to 
> leak out. He growls, spins, and begins running towards Epyon, 
> firing his four machine guns rapidly.
